s.text: Robert G. Kaufman, in a long review in the Weekly Standard (which welcomes Buchanan's departure from the Republican Party), paints Buchanan as having gone over to the dark side: He's "a representative of one of the perpetual temptations of conservative thought."

McCourt "seems less in control in this book and at times is powerless to keep himself from becoming the stage Irishman, crying in his beer, milking sentiment until it becomes false" (Peter Collier, the Los Angeles Times ). (Click here to read the first chapter.)
